content.name: Generic

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content:
Droptop Four is a popular dropdown app launcher for Windows & Rainmeter.
It is available in two variants, a `Basic` one, free, and a `Supporter` one, with a \'pay what you want\' donation.
Both variants have 14 system tray apps, the Always Show option to make it accessible everywhere on top of your desktop and a lot more.

fields.name: Basic Variant
fields.content:
The `Basic` variant has:
 - 100 included home icons
 - 6 fully-customizable folders
 - 4 themes to choose from
 - Up to 5 Community Apps

fields.name: Supporter Variant
fields.content:
The `Supporter` variant has:
 - Upload your own home icon
 - 12 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 22 themes to choose from
 - Up to 10 Community Apps

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info droptop Basic` or `/info droptop Supporter`

content.name: Basic

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content: This is the Basic and free variant of droptop.

fields.name: Perks
fields.content:
The `Basic` variant has:
 - 100 included home icons
 - 6 fully-customizable folders
 - 4 themes to choose from
 - Up to 5 Community Apps

fields.name: Download
fields.content:
To install it you have to download it on the [Droptop Four website](https://droptop-four.github.io/download)
To see further explanations on download methods type `/download Basic`

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info droptop Basic` or `/info droptop Supporter`

content.name: Supporter

fields.name: What is it?
fields.content:
This is the Supporter variant of droptop.
To download it you can pay what you want through Gumroad.

fields.name: Perks
fields.content:
The `Supporter` variant has:
 - Upload your own home icon
 - 12 fully-customizable toolbars
 - 22 themes to choose from
 - Up to 10 Community Apps

fields.name: Download
fields.content:
To install it you have to:
1) download the Basic variant on the [Droptop Four website](https://droptopfour.com/download)
2) download the Supporter update through [Gumroad](https://supporter.droptopfour.com) choosing how much you want to pay for it (recommended $6).
To see further explanations on download methods type `/download Supporter`

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info droptop Basic` or `/info droptop Supporter`

content.name: Generic

fields.name: Basic variant
fields.content: The Droptop **Basic** variant can be downloaded on the [Website](https://droptopfour.com/download). To see further informations about the Basic variant type `/info Basic`.

fields.name: Supporter variant
fields.content: The Droptop **Supporter** variant can be downloaded after paying what you want on [Gumroad](https://supporter.droptopfour.com). To see further informations about the Supporter variant type `/info Supporter`.

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info droptop Basic` or `/info droptop Supporter`

content.name: Supporter

fields.name: Supporter variant
fields.content: The Droptop **Supporter** variant can be downloaded after paying what you want starting from 8$ on [Gumroad](https://supporter.droptopfour.com). To see further informations about the Supporter variant type `/info Supporter`.

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info droptop Basic` or `/info droptop Supporter`

content.name: Generic

fields.name: Where to update?
fields.content: Droptop should automatically detect new updates, but you can install them also with the button below.

content.footer: To see further infos on one of the two variants type `/info droptop Basic` or `/info droptop Supporter`

fields.name: Where do I find the FAQs?
fields.content: You can find the FAQ at https://droptopfour.com/faq/

fields.name: Where do I find the Docs?
fields.content: You can find the Docs at https://docs.droptopfour.com

fields.name: Website link
fields.content: https://droptopfour.com
